GSP30abhmal2u:626: tasmād eveti cet tarhi na padaśrotṛtā na ca // 2.296 //
GSP30abhmal2u:631: tāvad astu na tu sphāras tāvāṃs tatreti carcitam
GSP30abhmal2u:634: tatsaṃskāragrahaś cet syāt kāmaṃ śāstrārtha īdṛśaḥ // 2.300 //
GSP30abhmal2u:635: na tu vaiṣṇavatā tasya sāṃkhyatā śrautatāpi vā
GSP30abhmal2u:637: vaiṣṇavādy eva tarhy asya pratyavāyo mahattaraḥ
GSP30abhmal2u:639: kiṃ brūṣe svayam eva tvaṃ bhedopahatavṛttikaḥ
GSP30abhmal2u:640: etad eva paraṃ dvaitaṃ bhavān eva saṃśritaḥ // 2.303 //
GSP30abhmal2u:641: yad ahaṃ vaiṣṇavo bhūṣṇuḥ śaive kiṃ nādhikāravān
GSP30abhmal2u:642: tat svayaṃ bhedamūḍhas tvaṃ bhede ca niyater balāt // 2.304 //
GSP30abhmal2u:643: tatas taiḥ pratyavāyaḥ syād yoga ity upapāditam
GSP30abhmal2u:644: kiṃ ca tādātmyayogena devatā pūjyate tataḥ // 2.305 //
GSP30abhmal2u:646: gītāsu ca tato gītaṃ yo yac chraddhaḥ sa eva saḥ // 2.306 //
GSP30abhmal2u:651: mukhyas tāvad ayaṃ kalpo yo yatraiva pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GSP30abhmal2u:652: nityaṃ tādātmyam āpannaḥ sa tatrādhikṛtas tv iti // 2.309 //
GSP30abhmal2u:653: ata eva tato grāhyaṃ jñānam ity abhidhīyate
GSP30abhmal2u:655: śiṣyas tadaiva śāstraṃ tu gṛhṇan pūrvāparakramāt
GSP30abhmal2u:656: kathaṃ svabuddhyā saṃdhattāṃ tāvad yat tena saṃhitam // 2.311 //
GSP30abhmal2u:657: yas tu saṃdhātum īheta sa sākṣāt parameśvaraḥ
GSP30abhmal2u:658: tasya kiṃ vā guruḥ kuryāt so 'nyeṣāṃ gurur ucyate // 2.312 //
GSP30abhmal2u:659: nānyato vedavidbhyaś cetyata eva hi manvate
GSP30abhmal2u:660: tasmāt tādātmyam āpanno gurur ity abhidhīyate // 2.313 //
GSP30abhmal2u:661: sa ca yāvati yatraiva tatra tāvati nānyathā
GSP30abhmal2u:663: tādātmyaṃ gurutāṃ hanti pūrṇadhīḥ pralapaty ayam
GSP30abhmal2u:666: vaiṣṇavo viṣṇur evāhaṃ taddāso veti carcayan // 2.316 //
GSP30abhmal2u:667: idānīṃ na tathāsmīti kim etat susamañjasam
GSP30abhmal2u:668: atra hy ekatamā saṃvin mithyājñānatvam aśnute // 2.317 //
GSP30abhmal2u:669: yayā sa eva patitaḥ śiṣyo vā patito bhavet
GSP30abhmal2u:670: tasmān mukhyo hy ayaṃ kalpaḥ pratiśāstraṃ gurur guruḥ // 2.318 //
GSP30abhmal2u:674: viṣṇor bhāgavatā magāś ca savituḥ śāṃbhor jaṭābhasmino
GSP30abhmal2u:675: māt-ṛṇām atha mātṛmaṇḍalavido viprās tv atha brahmaṇaḥ
GSP30abhmal2u:677: yo yair deva upāsyate svavidhinā tais tasya kāryā kriyā // 2.320 //
GSP30abhmal2u:679: deśe tatra bhaven nānā nādhikārasya bhājanam // 2.321 //
GSP30abhmal2u:680: yas tv asmin pūrṇasaṃbodhe rūḍho vāstavaśāsane
GSP30abhmal2u:683: anugrahaṃ sa vai kuryāt pūrṇatvād ūrdhvavṛttitaḥ // 2.323 //
GSP30abhmal2u:684: nanv advaye kim ūrdhvaṃ syān na kiṃcid bhedamohitāḥ
GSP30abhmal2u:685: bhavatas tv adharāvasthā bheda evadharo yataḥ // 2.324 //
GSP30abhmal2u:690: yo vaiṣṇavo manuṃ dadyāc chaivaṃ mūḍhamatiḥ śiśoḥ
GSP30abhmal2u:691: taṃ pāpaṃ vañcakaṃ tyaktvā śiśur nyāyyaṃ samācaret // 2.327 //
GSP30abhmal2u:692: ihāpy uktaṃ mokṣadaḥ syāt svabhyastajñānavān iti
GSP30abhmal2u:693: abhyastaṃ ca paraṃ jñānaṃ yato nāsty eva vicyutiḥ // 2.328 //
GSP30abhmal2u:694: paramādvayavijñānān na khalv apy asti vicyutiḥ
GSP30abhmal2u:696: kathaṃ ko vā kuto vāpi cyavatāṃ tiṣṭhatu kva vā
GSP30abhmal2u:697: itthaṃ ya eṣa śāstrārthaḥ sthitaḥ śaktiprabhāvataḥ // 2.330 //
GSP30abhmal2u:701: tadvyākhyātam idaṃ prasannagahanaṃ vākyaṃ mayā svāgama-
GSP30abhmal2u:704: bhātīti svayam eva satyahṛdayā jñāsyanti kiṃ ślāghitaiḥ // 2.332 //
GSP30abhmal2u:705: ye samyak pravicāriṇo nanu śivāḥ kas tān prati prodyamaḥ
GSP30abhmal2u:707: pāṣāṇāyitavṛttayaḥ punar amī ye śāstravandhyā narāḥ
GSP30abhmal2u:708: saṃrambhaḥ pralayambudher iva tataḥ svātmany ayaṃ ghūrṇate // 2.333 //
GSP30abhmal2u:709: saṃśāmya svayam ātmani tyaja javāj jvālājaṭāḍambarān
GSP30abhmal2u:710: bhoḥ kalpānala dāhyam asti bhavato nādyāpi kiñcid yataḥ
GSP30abhmal2u:712: viśvaṃ vyāpya vilīnatāṃ gatam idaṃ drāk tvatprakāśātmakam // 2.334 //
